m_szDocTitle: Patent US20140186659 - Hybrid battery system for electric and hybrid electric vehicles - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Hybrid battery system for electric and hybrid electric vehicles US 20140186659 A1 Abstract A disclosed energy storage system for an application having an energy requirement and a power requirement may include a first component configured to provide the energy requirement of the application and a second component configured to provide the power requirement of the application. At least one of a volume, mass, weight, or cost of the combination of the first component and the second component may be less than a volume, mass, weight, or cost needed for either the first component or the second compon
